comment: Smart Data Models - ExcIEEEST6B adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcIEEEST6B/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE Std 421.5-2005 type ST6B model. This model consists of a PI voltage regulator with an inner loop field voltage regulator and pre-control. The field voltage regulator implements a proportional control. The pre-control and the delay in the feedback circuit increase the dynamic response.  Reference: IEEE Standard 421.5-2005 Section 7.6.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: ilr
contents.comment: Exciter output current limit reference (I).  Typical Value = 4.164. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kci
contents.comment: Exciter output current limit adjustment (K).  Typical Value = 1.0577. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kff
contents.comment: Pre-control gain constant of the inner loop field regulator (K). Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kg
contents.comment: Feedback gain constant of the inner loop field regulator (K).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kia
contents.comment: Voltage regulator integral gain (K).  Typical Value = 45.094. Default: 0.0

contents.name: klr
contents.comment: Exciter output current limiter gain (K).  Typical Value = 17.33. Default: 0.0

contents.name: km
contents.comment: Forward gain constant of the inner loop field regulator (K).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kpa
contents.comment: Voltage regulator proportional gain (K).  Typical Value = 18.038. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: oelin
contents.comment: OEL input selector (OELin). Typical Value = noOELinput. Default: None

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: tg
contents.comment: Feedback time constant of inner loop field voltage regulator (T). Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0

contents.name: vamax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = 4.81. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vamin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = -3.85. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = 4.81. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = -3.85. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
